About Me


    Hi there, this is Yuan! I grew up in Montreal, Canada and moved to Waterloo to pursue a joint degree in Computer Science and Statistics in 2015. The last four years have been crazy! I traveled to 15 new cities and learnt so much about myself. There are a lot of things I LOVE and WANT to do.

    I enjoy working on data projects during my free time and polishing my programming skills. Currently, I am learning the ropes of data engineering, data visualization and data science.
